Package org.pepstock.charba.client.events

Interface EventHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AddHandlerEventHandler, AnimationCompleteEventHandler, AnimationProgressEventHandler, AxisClickEventHandler, AxisEnterEventHandler, AxisHoverEventHandler, AxisLeaveEventHandler, ChartClickEventHandler, ChartEventHandler, ChartHoverEventHandler, ChartResizeEventHandler, DatasetRangeCleanSelectionEventHandler, DatasetRangeSelectionEventHandler, DatasetSelectionEventHandler, LegendClickEventHandler, LegendHoverEventHandler, LegendLeaveEventHandler, RemoveHandlerEventHandler, SubtitleClickEventHandler, SubtitleEnterEventHandler, SubtitleLeaveEventHandler, TitleClickEventHandler, TitleEnterEventHandler, TitleLeaveEventHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPieOptions, Animation, AreaOptions, AtLeastOneDatasetHandler, BarOptions, BubbleMapOptions, BubbleOptions, ChoroplethOptions, ConfigurationOptions, DoughnutOptions, GaugeOptions, HorizontalBarOptions, Legend, LineOptions, MatrixOptions, MeterOptions, PieOptions, PolarAreaOptions, RadarOptions, SankeyOptions, ScalesOptions, ScatterOptions, StackedOptions, TimeSeriesBarOptions, TimeSeriesLineOptions, TreeMapOptions, VerticalLineOptions
    public interface EventHandler
    Interface for objects which will be handlers.
    Author:
